channel.title: Ip Ban
channel.description:
Hey Guys I Spent Months Working On A Devolution Server Althoguh I've Always Had A Problem.....I Can't Host :(
So I've Always Used A Hoster I Gave Him My Latest Update Which Took Weeks To Work On. Immediately Afterwards He Ip Banned Me And Blocked Me On Msn.
I Was Wondering If There Would Be A Way To Bypass This Ip Ban To Inform Players That The Server Is Leeched And Possibly Talk To Hoster. I Do Not Have Static Broadband Sadly Which Would Also Alow Me To Bypass The Ban Is There Any Other Alternatives?
All Help Is Appreciated. :)
Thanx

item.title: Ip Ban
item.dc:creator: @coder_2k8 coder 2k8
item.description:
@coder_2k8 wrote:

or go to www.smarthide.com and download ip changer hope i helped

Do that or just proxy the site…(silab or moparscape)
